articles.title: Would the Patriots’ dynasty have ever happened without new Hall of Famer Adam Vinatieri?
articles.description:
Vinatieri won three Super Bowls with the Patriots and a fourth with the Colts. While he may have played more seasons in Indianapolis, he is an ultimate Patriot.

The post Would the Patriots’ dynasty have ever happened without new Hall of Famer Adam Vinatieri? appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: Adam Vinatieri won three Super Bowls with the Patriots, solidifying their dynasty.
Vinatieri's clutch kicking was crucial in key playoff games from 2001 to 2004.
His Hall of Fame induction highlights the lasting legacy of the Patriots in Boston.

articles.title: Mike Vrabel throws a wrinkle in Patriots’ final practice ahead of Super Bowl LX
articles.description:
Vrabel had the Patriots prepare for the unusually long halftime break they'll deal with in the Super Bowl.

The post Mike Vrabel throws a wrinkle in Patriots’ final practice ahead of Super Bowl LX appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: Mike Vrabel adjusts Patriots' final practice for Super Bowl LX on February 12.
Patriots prepare for an extended halftime, impacting game strategy and player performance.
Boston fans anticipate how this preparation will affect the team's Super Bowl outcome.

articles.title: Patriots-Seahawks Super Bowl will likely come down to which quarterback makes the fewest mistakes
articles.description:
This has the potential to be a classic, leaving no margin for error with two QBs who have little in common other than being former No. 3 overall picks, and so much weight on their shoulders.

The post Patriots-Seahawks Super Bowl will likely come down to which quarterback makes the fewest mistakes appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: Patriots face Seahawks in Super Bowl LX on February 12, 2026.
Both teams feature former No. 3 overall pick quarterbacks.
Game outcome hinges on minimizing mistakes by each quarterback.

articles.title: Mass. company pleads guilty to OSHA violation that led to employee’s death
articles.description:
Josué Tiquiram was killed in September 2023 when heavy equipment malfunctioned at an East Freetown worksite.

The post Mass. company pleads guilty to OSHA violation that led to employee’s death appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: Massachusetts company pleads guilty to OSHA violation after Josué Tiquiram's death in September 2023.
Tiquiram was killed by malfunctioning heavy equipment at an East Freetown worksite.
The case highlights safety concerns for Boston area workers and potential regulatory changes.

articles.title: Here’s what Healey put up in her Super Bowl bet with Washington state governor
articles.description:
Caffeine and crustaceans are on the line — either way (go Pats!).

The post Here’s what Healey put up in her Super Bowl bet with Washington state governor appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: Governor Healey bet Washington's governor coffee and lobster on the Super Bowl outcome.
The wager highlights Boston's seafood industry and local coffee culture.
Residents can engage in friendly rivalry while supporting local businesses during the Super Bowl.
